pullRequest.title: drift net fishing: add plugin
pullRequest.bodyText:
This will add a plugin which shows the status of your nets and highlights any fish you haven't tagged.

Closes #9731
Supersedes/Closes #10139

nodes.bodyText: Generally we make constants final plus also caps: NETS
this should probably clear the npc lists
this is called on the wrong thread, and should be asserting?
this could probably be simplified with just a switch
it might be better if this were an enum?

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -458,6 +458,35 @@
 	 * The varbit that stores the oxygen percentage for player
 	 */
 	OXYGEN_LEVEL(5811),
+
+	/**
+	 * Drift net status
+	 *
+	 * Expected values
+	 *  0 = Unset
+	 *  1 = Set up
+	 *  2 = Caught some fish
+	 *  3 = Full
+	 */
+	NORTH_NET_STATUS(5812),
+	SOUTH_NET_STATUS(5814),
+
+	/**
+	 * Drift net catch count
+	 */
+	NORTH_NET_CATCH_COUNT(5813),
+	SOUTH_NET_CATCH_COUNT(5815),
+
+	/**
+	 * Drift net collect interface
+	 *
+	 * Expected values:
+	 *  0 = Not open
+	 *  1 = North interface open
+	 *  2 = South interface open
+	 */
+	DRIFT_NET_COLLECT(5933),
+

nodes.bodyText: inDriftNetArea = false; should also be set during shutdown.
Why are the area check and net varbit checks run on LOADING? Shouldn't these only be checked on LOGGED_IN?
